mapper.select: /* file : CounselingMapper.xml, id : getCounseling */ SELECT A.* , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , SUPPORT.SUPPORT_NAME AS SUPPORT_ORG_NAME , CASE WHEN A.FIELD = 1 THEN '법률' WHEN A.FIELD = 2 THEN '노무' WHEN A.FIELD = 3 THEN '세무' WHEN A.FIELD = 4 THEN '회계' WHEN A.FIELD = 5 THEN '지식재산' WHEN A.FIELD = 6 THEN '관세' WHEN A.FIELD = 7 THEN '법무' WHEN A.FIELD = 8 THEN '경영 컨설팅' END as C_FIELD FROM ST_COUNSELING A left join ST_SUPPORT as SUPPORT ON SUPPORT.SUPPORT_SEQ = A.SUPPORT_ORG WHERE A.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND A.COU_SEQ = #{couSeq}
